sorular.soru: When are you allowed to continue driving?
cevaplar: When the red lights are out.
sorular.dogruCevap: When the red lights are out.

feedback.metin: This level crossing is secured. When a train is due to pass, the red lights come on, the bell rings and the barriers go down. When the barriers are down, the bell stops ringing. When the train has passed, the barriers go up. After that, the red lights go out, and you may continue your journey.

sorular.soru: Can you carry passengers in a towed caravan?

feedback.metin: Transporting people in a towed caravan is prohibited. People may only be transported in a vehicle equipped for that purpose.

sorular.soru: Are you overtaking correctly?

feedback.metin: You are not maintaining enough lateral distance while overtaking. When overtaking or passing balance vehicles such as cyclists, mopeds, and snorfietsen, it is wise to maintain a lateral gap of approximately one to one and a half metres.

sorular.soru: Is it wise to drive like this?

feedback.metin: If your shoes are wet or full of snow, there is an increased risk that they will slide off the pedals. Always clean and dry wet shoes before driving.

sorular.soru: Do you have to turn right here?

feedback.metin: In this situation, you do not have to turn right. The sign shows a detour route. You are not required to follow this detour.

sorular.soru: You want to turn right. Can you change to the right lane?

feedback.metin: When the block marking becomes a solid line, you can no longer change lanes. You must stay in your lane.

sorular.soru: Is exiting a special manoeuvre?

feedback.metin: Both exiting and getting in lane fall under the category of special manoeuvres.

sorular.soru: How do you overtake a horse rider?
cevaplar: As quickly and smoothly as possible.
Slowly and by maintaining enough lateral distance.
sorular.dogruCevap: Slowly and by maintaining enough lateral distance.

feedback.metin: If you want to overtake a horse rider, do so at an adjusted speed of up to 15 km/h and with enough lateral distance. Do not use the horn, as this may startle the horse.

sorular.soru: Is it mandatory to keep a fire extinguisher in your car?

feedback.metin: Keeping a fire extinguisher in your car is not mandatory, but it is safer. If you keep a fire extinguisher in your car, make sure it is always mounted within easy reach.

sorular.soru: Can you drop off a passenger here?

feedback.metin: Parking or waiting on the blocked or checkered markings at a bus stop is prohibited. If there are no blocked markings, parking or waiting within 12 metres of the stop sign is prohibited. The only exception to this rule is if you are picking up or dropping off a passenger. This is allowed, even in the presence of blocked markings.

sorular.soru: Who should fill in the claim form in case of an accident with damage?
cevaplar: Both parties involved in the accident.
The person who caused the accident.
sorular.dogruCevap: Both parties involved in the accident.

feedback.metin: If you are involved in an accident, the parties involved, i.e. both parties, must fill in the European Damage Claim Form together. Both parties will receive a copy of this form, which must be sent to the insurance company. The backsides are filled in separately from each other. In case of cosmetic damage only, there is no need to call the police, unless there are irregularities such as not being able to show a driving licence or ID card or not having insurance.

sorular.soru: Are heavily pregnant women required to wear a seat belt?

feedback.metin: Pregnant women, like any other passenger, must wear a seat belt as a three-point belt in the standard fashion. Try to position the lap belt as low as possible under the abdomen.

sorular.soru: Should you expect drivers coming from the right?

feedback.metin: This situation indicates that the intersecting road is closed to all drivers travelling in any direction other than that indicated by the arrow on the C-4 sign. The intersecting road is a one-way street.

sorular.soru: Should you stop here and wait for an opportunity to merge?

feedback.metin: You are not allowed to stop here. Drive slowly alongside the traffic jam and merge at the earliest possible opportunity.

sorular.soru: Who should you give way to here?

feedback.metin: When performing a special manoeuvre, you must give way to all other road users, including pedestrians.

sorular.soru: Are you allowed to overtake the lorry?

feedback.metin: It is too foggy to see if oncoming traffic is approaching. It is not safe to overtake here and it is therefore prohibited.

sorular.soru: Are Y-junctions subject to the same right of way rules as full intersections?

feedback.metin: At Y-junctions, three roads intersect. The rules for right of way at Y-junctions are the same as those for other intersections. At equivalent intersections, drivers coming from the right have right of way.

sorular.soru: What should you do if the brake pedal starts to vibrate during an emergency stop in a car equipped with ABS?
cevaplar: Release the brake pedal for a moment and then apply it again.
Keep the brake pedal fully pressed.
sorular.dogruCevap: Keep the brake pedal fully pressed.

feedback.metin: During an emergency stop in a car with ABS, you will notice that the brake pedal vibrates when you hit it hard. This is due to the ABS acting on the brake force, which prevents the wheels from locking. If you (briefly) release the brake pedal at that moment, the car will not brake through and the stopping distance will become longer. So keep applying the brake until you come to a standstill.

sorular.soru: At what distance from the car do you place the warning triangle?

feedback.metin: If you come to a standstill on the carriageway due to a breakdown and pose a possible danger to others, you must place a warning triangle. This may be replaced or supplemented with the hazard lights. If you place a warning triangle, it must be placed at a distance of approximately 30 metres in the direction of the traffic for which the vehicle poses a danger.

sorular.soru: Is it safe to wait here for help after a breakdown?

feedback.metin: If you have a breakdown and stop on the hard shoulder, stand behind the crash barrier to wait for the breakdown service.

sorular.soru: On which side is a trailer required to have retro-reflectors?
cevaplar: Only at the front and rear.
At the front and rear and both sides.
sorular.dogruCevap: At the front and rear and both sides.

feedback.metin: A trailer must have two red reflectors at the rear, two white reflectors at the front and amber reflectors at the sides. The rearmost of these may be red.

sorular.soru: In which scenario does the tractor have right of way?

feedback.metin: You are leaving via an exit construction and must therefore give way to all other traffic. The “short turn goes before long turn” rule does not apply in this case. In both scenarios, the tractor has right of way.

sorular.soru: Are you obligated to offer help if you witness an accident?
cevaplar: Only if you are involved in the accident yourself.
Only if you have a first aid certificate or are medically trained.
This is mandatory if insufficient help is available.
sorular.dogruCevap: This is mandatory if insufficient help is available.

feedback.metin: By law, anyone who witnesses an accident is required to offer any assistance they can. Leaving an injured person at the scene of an accident is forbidden, even if you were not personally involved in the accident. If you witness an accident and there are not enough people in the vicinity to help, you must provide assistance. It is also prudent to share your contact information.

sorular.soru: Can you drive with defective windscreen wipers?
cevaplar: Yes. As long as your visibility is still adequate.
No. The front and rear wipers must be working properly.
No. Only the rear wipers may be defective.
sorular.dogruCevap: No. Only the rear wipers may be defective.

feedback.metin: The windscreens of passenger vehicles must be equipped with a properly functioning windscreen wiper system that facilitates sufficient visibility for the driver. This means you cannot drive the vehicle if the windscreen wipers are not working. You may drive with a defective rear wiper.

sorular.soru: Can you load and unload goods here?
cevaplar: Yes. No parking disc is required for this.
No. Only picking up or dropping off passengers is allowed here.
Yes. But you must use a parking disc.
sorular.dogruCevap: Yes. No parking disc is required for this.

feedback.metin: The blue line indicates a parking disc area, where drivers of motor vehicles with more than two wheels must display a parking disc to park legally. Loading and unloading goods and picking up and dropping off passengers is classed as stopping, rather than parking, and is therefore allowed here. A parking disc is not necessary for this.

sorular.soru: Does this speed limit also apply when no road workers are present?

feedback.metin: This sign combination always applies, even when no road workers are present. The road may be temporarily narrower, or there may be other modifications that require lower speeds. If these signs temporarily do not apply, or do not apply yet because the roadworks have yet to start, then they are turned away or taped off.

sorular.soru: Which warning does this symbol indicate?
cevaplar: The seat belt is not in use.
The headrest is not adjusted correctly.

feedback.metin: This warning light indicates an airbag malfunction.

sorular.soru: At which traffic light do you have to take oncoming traffic into account?

feedback.metin: At traffic light A, both traffic coming from this direction and traffic coming from the opposite direction may turn left or right or go straight ahead. The traffic streams may therefore intersect. At traffic light B, the situation is such that only traffic coming from this direction is allowed to enter the road on the left, so you do not have to take oncoming traffic into account.

sorular.soru: What lighting should you use during the day when visibility is severely restricted by rain?
cevaplar: Dipped headlights or front fog lights.
sorular.dogruCevap: Dipped headlights or front fog lights.

feedback.metin: In case of poor visibility due to rainfall, you should always reduce your speed. Do not overtake and maintain a wide following distance. Make sure you have dipped headlights and/or front fog lights on. Rear fog lights are prohibited during rain because of the risk of glare and may only be used in case of fog or snowfall if visibility is less than 50 metres.

sorular.soru: Can you reverse out of here?
cevaplar: No, you cannot turn or reverse.
Yes, you can reverse but you cannot turn.
No, you can turn but you cannot reverse.
sorular.dogruCevap: No, you cannot turn or reverse.

feedback.metin: Turning or reversing on a motorway or autoweg is prohibited. This also applies to the approach road before the motorway.

sorular.soru: Does a trailer with an authorised maximum weight of 650 kg have to be equipped with a reversing light?

feedback.metin: It is allowed to have one or two reversing lights on the trailer or caravan, but this is not mandatory as long as this trailer or caravan is lighter than 750 kg.

sorular.soru: What kind of lighting should be used here?

feedback.metin: Always switch on dipped headlights well before entering a tunnel. Sidelights do not emit enough light, and rear lights are not always on when daytime running lights are.

sorular.soru: What does this green line indicate?
cevaplar: That you are driving through a nature reserve.
That you are driving on an autoweg.
sorular.dogruCevap: That you are driving on an autoweg.

feedback.metin: The green line between the white markings indicates that you are driving on an autoweg. On autowegen, the speed limit is 100 km/h, unless signage indicates otherwise.

sorular.soru: When are you allowed to overtake just before a pedestrian crossing?
cevaplar: When you have seen that there are no pedestrians about to cross.
Only when it is a small, slow driving vehicle.

feedback.metin: You are not allowed to overtake other vehicles just before a pedestrian crossing. This includes cyclists, moped drivers and snorfietsers. Even if you have seen that there are no pedestrians about to cross the pedestrian crossing, you are not allowed to overtake here.

sorular.soru: What do you do if the red passenger car overtakes you on the right?
cevaplar: Speed up and sound your horn.
Increase your speed and move to the right.
Let the other driver go ahead.
sorular.dogruCevap: Let the other driver go ahead.

feedback.metin: In principle, overtaking takes place on the left-hand side. If you are overtaken by another vehicle on the right instead of the left, in a place where this is prohibited, do not play judge. This is too risky. Let the driver carry out his overtaking manoeuvre safely. Make sure you do not drive unnecessarily to the left, which may cause other vehicles to overtake you incorrectly on the right. If this is the case, move to the right as soon as it is safe to do so.

sorular.soru: Are you pre-sorted correctly?

feedback.metin: You have already turned your wheels in the direction you want to turn. This means that if you are in a rear-end collision, you will be forced into oncoming traffic. If you are pre-sorted, you should always position your wheels facing forwards if possible.

sorular.soru: What are parking lights?
cevaplar: Daytime running light in combination with rear light.
Side light in combination with rear light.
Dipped headlights in combination with rear lights.
sorular.dogruCevap: Side light in combination with rear light.

feedback.metin: The parking light is used to indicate the presence of a parked vehicle. The parking light is not a separate light but consists of the side light in combination with the rear lights.

sorular.soru: Who is liable when a vehicle is being used for street racing?
cevaplar: Only the owner of the vehicle.
Only the driver of the vehicle.
Both the driver as well as the owner of the vehicle.
sorular.dogruCevap: Both the driver as well as the owner of the vehicle.

feedback.metin: It is not allowed to race other drivers on public roads. Both the driver as wel as the owner of the vehicle is liable.
